long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doggy Tracker is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you track, save, and rank your most frequently visited websites. It provides a seamless, offline experience that keeps your browsing data private and secure, sending it only to your eyes.

With Doggy Tracker, you can:

- Track the websites you visit most often.
- Save them in a convenient, customizable bookmark folder.
- Rank these websites based on your personal browsing habits.

Key Features:

- Completely Offline: No data is shared outside your deviceâ€”your browsing history stays private.
- Website Ranking: Automatically ranks your browsing history and orders the most accessed websites based on your habits.
- Customizable Settings: Tailor the extension to your preferences with adjustable settings, and set custom values for each website on a per-site basis.
- More Features Coming Soon: We're constantly working on new updates to make Doggy Tracker even better.

General Settings:

- Website Tracking Limit: Set the maximum number of websites to track.
- Website URLs Limit: Adjust the number of URLs the extension tracks.
- Default Folder Name: Customize the name of your default bookmark folder (e.g., "Doggy Tracker Bookmarks").
- Extension Theme: Choose between Dark or Light Theme for a personalized look.
- Auto Sync: Enable automatic syncing of new websites.

Website Settings:

- Sync Folder Name: Automatically sync and name website-specific folders based on the site's hostname.
- Delete: Remove the website's bookmark folder when no longer needed.
- Start/Stop Sync: Toggle the sync feature for each website based on your settings.

Special Mentions:

A big thank you to:

- icongeek26 for the Flaticon icons
- Font Awesome
- React Bootstrap
- Remarkjs
- Shields.io

Download Doggy Tracker today and make managing your most visited websites easier than ever!
